text: O re neetse tsholofetso ya One le maikano, e le dilo tse pedi tse re ka di dumelang gotlhelele, gonne ga go kgonege gore Modimo o bue maaka. Jaanong botlhe ba ba tshabelang kwa go One go ba boloka ba ka kgothatsega sesha fa ba utlwa kaga ditsholofetso tse, tse di tswang kwa Modimong; ebile jaanong ba ka itse, kwa ntle ga go belaela, gore Modimo o tlaa ba neela poloko e o e ba solofeditseng.
